title: GET_WATER_QUAD_AT_COORDS
content:
0x17321452// GetWaterQuadAtCoords
int GET_WATER_QUAD_AT_COORDS(float x, float y);Parameters:x: The X coordinatey: The Y coordinateReturns: The water quad index at the given position. Returns -1 if there isn't any there.This native returns the index of a water quad if the given point is inside its bounds.If you also want to check for water level, check out GetWaterQuadAtCoords_3dExamples:Lualocal currentPedPosition = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local waterQuadIndex = GetWaterQuadAtCoords(currentPedPosition.x, currentPedPosition.y)
codeBlocks:
// GetWaterQuadAtCoords
int GET_WATER_QUAD_AT_COORDS(float x, float y);

local currentPedPosition = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
local waterQuadIndex = GetWaterQuadAtCoords(currentPedPosition.x, currentPedPosition.y)
